Title: Relates to providing for the legal ownership of a companion animal
Summary: Allows a court to determine legal ownership of a companion animal, taking into consideration the well-being of the companion animal, during proceedings for dissolution of marriage, legal separation and proceedings commenced by individuals who have both resided with the companion animal.
LawCode: Add ยง256, Dom Rel L; add ยง382, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the domestic relations law and the agriculture and markets law, in relation to providing for the legal ownership of a companion animal
